main event: A military pilot observed a bright light that appeared to be a satellite, but was moving at a high rate of speed and disappearing and reappearing.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of a basketball and as bright as a very bright star.
The object moved in a straight line from the southeast to the southwest, passing a star that was directly overhead.
The object instantly disappeared and reappeared for a fraction of a second before disappearing again.
The witness was an experienced USAF pilot and airline pilot, who felt it was his duty to report the sighting.
Weather conditions were clear with scattered high clouds, and the object was observed for 6-7 minutes.
sighted object: a bright light that appeared to be a satellite, but was brighter and moved faster
